group_1.textCenter: Yup, all the classes look delicious!
(But of course, the highlight of the middle@school section is Manaka's class!)
My class is a food stall, but it's not just any@food stall...
Takoyaki and yakisoba with a Westernized twist,@by yours truly!

group_1.textRight: Tsumugiiiii!
Hey, didn't you say you're on the organizing@committee?!
There's trouble! It's really terrible!@Please come help!!

group_1.narration: This is a warning...@Call off the school festival...@If you don't cancel the festival...@A series of troubles will follow, and@the consequences will be terrible.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha...?! I-it's happening already...?!
Wooow, that's a lot of food!
Are these all ingredients for the takoyaki and@yakisoba?

group_1.textRight: ...That was the plan.

group_1.textLeft: "Was" the plan...?

group_1.textRight: Take a closer look at them.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...?
Sauces, seasonings, spices...and...
...Ah! This is the FROZEN variety!
Microwavable takoyaki and yakisoba!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...! We received prepackaged frozen meals@by mistake!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: Even the dough for the takoyaki and the noodles@for the yakisoba.
We were going to cook it together with a recipe@I came up with...
But at this rate, we'll have no choice but to@serve microwaved takoyaki and yakisoba!

group_1.textLeft: Ehh...ehhhhhh?!
Why did this happen? Are you saying there was@a mistake in the order?!

group_1.textRight: Actually...we don't know how things went wrong...
But, if we don't do something about it, we'll@definitely have a lot of leftovers!

group_1.textLeft: Leftovers? Why?

group_1.textRight: Because we ordered a lot for Manaka's recipe...
And ordinary takoyaki and yakisoba won't sell@that well...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe this is karma for relying on Manaka all@the time...

group_1.textRight: With no budget and no time, isn't it impossible@to reorder?
Let's just give up and leave it at that.

group_1.textLeft: N-no! It's too early to give up!

group_1.textRight: Tsumugi!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...!

group_1.textRight: Can't the organizing committee do something@about this?
If possible, I'd like actual ingredients...@Like flour...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hmmm, we don't have any spare supplies...@That might be difficult...

group_1.textRight: ...Then...I'll just prepare it myself!
I'm sure if I use the restaurant's connections,@I'll be able toâ€”

group_1.textLeft: No, no! You can't do that!

group_1.textRight: Why not?!

group_1.textLeft: Because everyone is doing their best to stick to@the budget they've been given.
And if you do it with your own money...@That's against the rules!
Your class wouldn't be able to participate@in the school festival!

group_1.textRight: Guh...for once, you've got a good argument...!

group_1.textLeft: And if the school festival is canceled because@of such problems...
I won't be able to eat any delicious food either!

group_1.textRight: ...So that's your real reason...
But if we don't sell them either, we'll be in@trouble...

group_1.textLeft: Everything will be fine!

select.textSelect: Anything cooked by Manaka is delicious!
If there's any leftovers,@we can eat them after the festival!
Anything cooked by Manaka is delicious!
If there's any leftovers,@we can eat them after the festival!
